content: pie beret and purse - crochet pattern us terms copyright grace akatsu 2023 graceakatsu@gmail com important note full credit for the pie beret idea goes to designer regina rioux it seems that she released a set of three pie-ret patterns on her blog in 2008 but they are no longer available online here is her ravelry post and her blog post the matching pie purse is my own idea i do not feel comfortable charging for a pattern based on a different designer s idea so this will be available for free if you would like to support me please consider tipping me on venmo and checking out my other ravelry patterns stay tuned for future pattern releases shout-out also to my cousin ca8ty who posted this beret and purse on her tiktok love you copyright grace akatsu 2023 graceakatsu@gmail com materials dk weight yarn i used lion brand 24/7 cotton in grenadine and cacao o 100g ball 273 yards of red sufficient for both beret and purse o 100g ball 273 yards of beige sufficient for both beret and purse length of strong flat ribbon i used curling ribbon this is to strengthen purse handle and prevent stretching 3mm crochet hook for beret headband only 4mm crochet hook 5mm crochet hook for purse handle only super glue stitch markers scissors tapestry needle abbreviations magic_ring = magic_ring yo = yarn over sl = slip_stitch chain = chain bl = back loop single_crochet = single_crochet scinc = single_crochet increase § work 2 single_crochet in one stitch scdec = single_crochet decrease § insert hook into stitch and draw up a loop insert hook into next stitch and draw up a loop yo draw through all 3 loops on hook half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet tc3tog = treble_crochet 3 together § yo 2x around hook insert hook into stitch and draw up a loop yo draw through 2 yo draw through 2 yo 2x around hook insert hook into same stitch and draw up a loop yo draw through 2 yo draw through 2 yo 2x around hook insert hook into same stitch and draw up a loop yo draw through 2 yo draw through 2 yo draw through all 4 loops on hook copyright grace akatsu 2023 graceakatsu@gmail com beret top using red yarn and 4mm hook do not flip work between row final stitch counts in each row
